description.narrative: By 2025, more people in targeted rural and poor urban areas have access to sustainable and affordable safely managed WASH services, which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Disaster Risk Reduction, Environmental Sustainability, Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Water, Water (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, more children and their families, particularly in rural and poor urban areas and in humanitarian situations, use affordable, sustainable and safely managed water and sanitation services, practice safe hygiene behaviours.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
